snippet: Tina Charles, 23, has climbed to the top of her profession, winning an Olympic gold medal for the United States and the W.N.B.A.’s Most Valuable Player award.
abstract: Profile of Connecticut Sun center Tina Charles, who won the WNBA's Most Valuable Player award and an Olympic gold medal this year; Charles honed her skills on playgrounds and in gyms throughout New York City.
lead_paragraph: Tina Charles, 23, has climbed to the top of her profession, winning an Olympic gold medal for the United States and the W.N.B.A.’s Most Valuable Player award.

headline.seo: Title Is Next Target for Tina Charles, Rising Connecticut Star
headline.main: Title Is Next Target for a Rising Connecticut Star
headline.print_headline: Title Is Next Target for a Rising Connecticut Star
